entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Navigation data does not get passed on first navigation after app is loaded or resumed #10509
  • MediaPicker.CapturePhotoAsync crash on the Kyocera C6930 #10508
  • Hot Reload Doesn't work if another control references it #10506
  • Android Editor doesn't render text the full width of the displayed field #10505
  • Opacity not applied to BoxView and Frame #10503
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.Maui.ApplicationModel.VersionTracking.Default throws exception #10499
  • Label in Border HorizontalTextAlignement visual bug #10497
    Backlog
  • Improve how we can set the `Window` property over controls #10496
    .NET 8 Planning

Closed

  • Setting images in code (still) doesn't work on Android #7074
    7.0
  • [Shell][Win] No animal like a Xaminal #8714
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Tabbed page in .Net Maui not working on Android #10504
  • If automatic update is implemented #10299
  • Deployed MAUI app as MSIX on server 2019 not unpackage #10363
  • Windows cannot install package Microsoft.WindowsAppRuntime.1.1_1003.565.600.0_x64__8wekyb3d8bbwe #10379
  • ApplicationData.Current support for Windows Unpackaged #8419
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Application.Current.Resources no keys available #7585
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Uneven margin/padding along OnPlatform #10391
    Backlog
  • Screenshot doesn't work on iOS #9866
    Backlog
  • Cannot build Xaml in Platforms/Windows folder #10440

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Ensure SearchView meets min size requirements #10510
  • Bump Microsoft.Graphics.Win2D from 1.0.3.1 to 1.0.4 #10502
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • init #10501
    community ✨

Merged

  • [Windows ] Fix Shell SearchBarHandler #9679
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
  • Add release 6.0.536 #10129
    area/docs 📓, community ✨
  • Add support for SecureStorage in Unpackaged apps #10476
    platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞, 7.0
  • [Tizen] Use Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Skia.Views.SkiaGraphicsView #10359
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • Added groupId to ResourceDictionary template #10389
    area/tooling ⚙️, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [ci] Include shortened MSIs in multi-target drop #10495
  • Suppress obsolete path for EndPDFContent #10493

Updated

  • [Windows] Map the Window title to the automation name property #10159
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/a11y
  • [Android] Implement PointerGestureRecognizer for Android #10352
    area/gestures
  • [Windows] Fix wrong Frame sizing #10094
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/layout 🔲, area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • [Android] Fix crash when opening a `TabbedPage` from a `ContentPage` that is referenced in `Shell` #9213
    area/TabbedPage, community ✨
  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.1.4 to 1.1.5 #10119
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Added pending changes to Essentials Permissions from Xamarin.Forms #10092
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞
  • [Windows] Fix crash in WebView updating the Source two times in a row #10456
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Add inline code documentation guidelines #10465
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Housekeeping] Including pending fixes from Xamarin.Forms SRs #8702
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge
  • Added Tag to map pin #10446
    community ✨
